sentence.Network_en: Cancun is in Mexico, on the Yucatan Peninsula.
sentence.Network_cn: 坎昆在墨西哥的尤卡坦半岛.

sentence.Network_en: But in Yucatan, Mexico, no one answers " I don't know. "
sentence.Network_cn: 而在尤卡坦 、 墨西哥没人回答 “ 我不知道 ”.

sentence.Network_en: The site is Dzibilchaltun, one of Yucatan's earliest Maya cities.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个位于墨西哥尤卡坦半岛的遗址曾经是玛雅时代的城市.
